General.Name: Bcl Industries Limited
General.Description: BCL Industries Limited engages in edible oil and distillery business in India and South Asian region. The company operates through three segments: Oil & Vanaspati, Distillery, and Real Estate. It provides edible oils, expelling oil, basmati rice, rice bran refined oil, and vanaspati ghee under the Home Cook, Murli, WHITE GOLD, and Do Khajoor brands. The company also offers extra neutral alcohol, ethanol, and liquor under the ASLI SANTRA, RANJHA SANUFI, PUNJAB SPECIAL WHISKY, PUNJAB SPECIAL RUM, PUNJAB SPECIAL GIN, COZI DRY GIN, RED ROYAL WHISKY, and SUMMER CHEF VODKA brands. In addition, it develops real estate properties, including service plots, villas, group housing, commercial complexes, malls, schools, club and community centers, and dedicated temples. The company was formerly known as BCL Industries & Infrastructures Limited and changed its name to BCL Industries Limited in April 2018. BCL Industries Limited was incorporated in 1976 is based in Bhatinda, India.
